template_data.alt: A tavern. A man and a woman are chatting at the bar; a woman cleans the bar behind them. On the right side, there are two heads on the foreground. A sign reading "Hogan" sits in the center-top of the picture.

document_data.name: Happy Hogan's Igloo
document_data.mainbody: '''Happy Hogan's Desert Igloo''' was an inn in the Sandvoyagers Compound within the [[Oasis of the White Palm]] in [[Raurin]].{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|72}}
document_data.Location: Happy Hogan's Desert Igloo lay within the Sandvoyagers Compound in the Oasis, off to the side but under its dome.
document_data.Structure: Happy Hogan's Desert Igloo occupied half a dome on the eastern side of the compound. There were two large mirrors around the door on the wall. The space behind the dome had a roof; it was used as a stable.
document_data.Services: The inn was open from dawn to midnight.
document_data.Staff: The gnome [[Fogli Forkbeard]] had a room at the inn and a cook, [[Cookie (person)|Cookie]], prepared meals.
document_data.Patrons: The guards of [[Kassim Arslan]],{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|70}} as well as the assassin [[Zorath Blackblade]],  drink at the inn.
